brief: Norway's golden Wednesday: Johaug dominates the 10km, Granerud soars in ski jumping.
Premier League title race heats up as Liverpool face Sunderland, City host Fulham.
Haaland chases goals as Manchester City aim to close gap on leaders Arsenal.

Thu 10:00 â€” Alpine Giant Slalom (Kristoffersen, Braathen)
Fri 12:00 â€” XC Men's Sprint Free (Klaebo's first gold chance)
Sun 08:00 â€” XC Men's 50km Mass Start (Klaebo's signature race)

radar: Klaebo's sprint free on Friday marks Norway's first major gold opportunity in cross-country, followed by his signature 50km endurance test on Sunday where he'll aim for Olympic immortality.

The Boe brothers anchor Norway's biathlon relay next Monday targeting gold in the nation's most decorated Olympic sport, while Kristoffersen and Braathen face their biggest alpine test Tuesday in the dramatic slalom showdown.
